str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From prophetes; to foretell events, divine, speak under inspiration, exercise the prophetic office.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
Feminine of a compound of oikos and the base of doma; architecture, i.e. a structure; figuratively, confirmation.
Encouragement, comfort, consolation, exhortation. From paramutheomai; consolation.
